content: Mang Ye - Wuhan University Mang Ye Professor School of Computer Science Wuhan University [Bio] [Google Scholar][DBLP][GitHub] [学校主页] Room E503, School of Computer Science, Wuhan University Email: yemang AT whu.edu.cn, mangye16 AT gmail.com Welcome to the Multimedia Analysis and ReaSoning (MARS) Group at the Wuhan University, led by Prof. Mang Ye. Our research interests include privacy-preserving multi-modal learning and its applications in multimedia analysis and reasoning.
